title: 3 Bedroom Townhome in Aurora SE
posting_body: Located near Chambers and Evans in Chambers Ridge Townhomes this 3 bedroom 1 1/4 bath townhome is 1140 sf and includes wood fireplace, washer/dryer hookups and attached 2 car garage.
Please go first to our website, <URL>, and read the requirements (Terms of Service) located in the application section and then call Metro Denver Management at
